--- title: Solar keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Access data and analysis services that provide access to solar resource data and NREL models using a python API." description: "Access data and analysis services that provide access to solar resource data and NREL models using a python API." nb_path: "01_solar.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

{% include note.html content='In order to use the NREL developer API, you will need an API key from NREL. You can get one here. The process is simple and only requires your name and email where you will receive the API key. ' %}

SolarResourceData

{% raw %}

class SolarResourceData[source]

SolarResourceData(api_key, lat=None, lon=None, address=None) :: _GetPostRequest

Returns various types of solar data for a location as a dictionary. The service from NREL currently returns data for average Direct Normal Irradiance, average Global Horizontal Irradiance, and average Tilt at Latitude.

Attributes: api_key: NREL Developer API key (https://developer.nrel.gov/signup/). lat: Latitude of the location. lon: Longitude of the location. address: Address of the location to use. Required if lat/lon not specified.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

An example to get solar resource data - average Direct Normal Irradiance, average Global Horizontal Irradiance, and average tilt - from NREL

{% raw %} 
solar_resource_data = SolarResourceData(api_key=NREL_API_KEY, lat=40, lon=-105)
{% endraw %}

Outputs for solar resource data

{% raw %} 
solar_resource_data.outputs

{'avg_dni': {'annual': 6.06,
  'monthly': {'jan': 5.0,
   'feb': 5.34,
   'mar': 5.94,
   'apr': 6.11,
   'may': 6.36,
   'jun': 7.43,
   'jul': 7.48,
   'aug': 6.65,
   'sep': 6.81,
   'oct': 5.82,
   'nov': 5.11,
   'dec': 4.67}},
 'avg_ghi': {'annual': 4.81,
  'monthly': {'jan': 2.5,
   'feb': 3.43,
   'mar': 4.69,
   'apr': 5.69,
   'may': 6.6,
   'jun': 7.25,
   'jul': 7.14,
   'aug': 6.24,
   'sep': 5.35,
   'oct': 3.85,
   'nov': 2.75,
   'dec': 2.19}},
 'avg_lat_tilt': {'annual': 5.82,
  'monthly': {'jan': 4.79,
   'feb': 5.4,
   'mar': 6.07,
   'apr': 6.11,
   'may': 6.25,
   'jun': 6.47,
   'jul': 6.58,

   'sep': 6.53,
   'oct': 5.71,
   'nov': 4.99,
   'dec': 4.47}}}
{% endraw %}

Use address to access the solar resource data

{% raw %} 
address = "Seattle, WA"

solar_resource_data = SolarResourceData(api_key=NREL_API_KEY, address=address)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

PVWatts V6

{% raw %}

class PVWattsV6[source]

PVWattsV6(api_key, system_capacity, module_type, losses, array_type, tilt, azimuth, lat=None, lon=None, address=None, file_id=None, dataset='nsrdb', radius=100, timeframe='monthly', dc_ac_ratio=1.2, gcr=0.4, inv_eff=96) :: _GetPostRequest

Estimate the energy production of grid-connected photovoltaic (PV) energy systems using NREL's PVWatts API based on a few simple inputs.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Example to use PVWattsV6 for a given set of input parameters.

{% raw %} 
pvwatts_v6 = PVWattsV6(api_key=NREL_API_KEY,
                       system_capacity=4,
                       lat=40,
                       lon=-105,
                       azimuth=180,
                       tilt=40,
                       array_type=1,
                       module_type=1,
                       losses=10
                      )
{% endraw %}

SolarDatasetQuery

{% raw %}

class SolarDatasetQuery[source]

SolarDatasetQuery(api_key, lat=None, lon=None, address=None, radius=100, return_all_stations=False) :: _GetPostRequest

Returns information on the closest climate data for a location.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Information on climate data for the location closest to the specified one.

{% raw %} 
solar_dataset_query = SolarDatasetQuery(api_key=NREL_API_KEY,
                                        lat=40,
                                        lon=-105,
                                       )
{% endraw %}

Outputs for the solar dataset

{% raw %} 
solar_dataset_query.outputs

{'tmy2': {'id': '0-94018',
  'city': 'BOULDER',
  'state': 'COLORADO',
  'timezone': -7,
  'lat': 40.13,
  'lon': -105.24,
  'elevation': 1689,
  'distance': 24977},
 'tmy3': {'id': '1-724699',
  'city': 'BROOMFIELD/JEFFCO [BOULDER - SURFRAD]',
  'state': 'COLORADO',

  'lon': -105.24,
  'elevation': 1689,
  'distance': 24977},

  'city': '',
  'state': 'Colorado',
  'country': None,
  'lat': 40.01,
  'lon': -105.02,
  'distance': 2029,
  'timezone': -7,
  'elevation': 1582,
  'resolution': 4}}
{% endraw %}

Get information about all the stations within a specified radius

{% raw %} 
solar_dataset_query = SolarDatasetQuery(api_key=NREL_API_KEY,
                                        lat=40,
                                        lon=-105,
                                        radius=100,
                                        return_all_stations=True
                                       )
